movies.title: Le grand amour
movies.plot: Pierre married Florence, the only daughter of a small industrialist. 15 years later, he is the boss, but his middle-class life worries him a lot. When a new young and lovely secretary comes, he starts dreaming.
movies.simplePlot: After fifteen years of average married life and stifling in-laws, a businessman undergoes a midlife crisis and pursues his attractive young secretary.

biography.bio: Pierre Étaix was born on November 23, 1928 in Roanne, Loire, France as Pierre Léon Étaix. He was an actor and writer, known for Yoyo (1965), The Suitor (1962) and Le grand amour (1969). He was married to Odile Crepin and Annie Fratellini. He died on October 14, 2016 in France.
biography.name: Pierre Étaix

biography.bio: The granddaughter of a famous clown and a member of the Fratellini circus family, Annie Fratellini continued the tradition by being a circus artist herself as of the age of fourteen. Later she became the first female circus clown in France and the founder of the first circus school of the country. Not content to be a big top star, she was also a singer and a stage and movie actress. Of course these activities only came second to her burning passion - circus. Nevertheless she can be remembered on the silver screen for at least two roles, that of Mado Petits Pieds, the waitress in Louis Malle's imaginative illustration of Raymond Queneau's Zazie dans le métro (1960) and of Pierre Étaix's wife (which she was also in real life) in his funnily poetic Le grand amour (1969). Sure, in latter film, she has a powerful opponent in the charming person of Nicole Calfan, but guess who wins the game in end!
biography.name: Annie Fratellini

biography.bio: Leading lady in French theatre and films.
biography.name: Nicole Calfan

biography.bio: Alain Janey was born on February 28, 1926 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France. He was an actor, known for Le grand amour (1969), Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo (1977) and Tant qu'on a la santé (1966). He died on December 11, 1998 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Alain Janey

biography.bio: Ketty France is an actress, known for Playtime (1967), Le grand amour (1969) and Judex (1963).
biography.name: Ketty France

biography.bio: Louis Maiss was born on August 17, 1899 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for Le grand amour (1969), Au revoir, monsieur Grock (1950) and Naughty Girl (1956). He died on August 28, 1976 in Aulnay-sous-Bois, Seine-Saint-Denis, France.
biography.name: Louis Maiss

biography.bio: Jacqueline Rouillard is an actress, known for The Bride Wore Black (1968), The Two of Us (1967) and Le grand amour (1969).
biography.name: Jacqueline Rouillard

biography.bio: Renée Gardès was born on January 12, 1887 in Paris, France. She was an actress, known for Le grand amour (1969), Les mystères de Paris (1962) and Somewhere, Someone (1972). She died on January 6, 1972 in Paris.
biography.name: Renée Gardès

biography.bio: Billy Bourbon is an actor, known for Playtime (1967), Le grand amour (1969) and Les vécés étaient fermés de l'intérieur (1976).
biography.name: Billy Bourbon

biography.bio: Claude Massot was born on February 28, 1942 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France. He was an actor and director, known for Kabloonak (1994), The Suitor (1962) and L'alboum de Zouc (1974). He died on February 24, 1995 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Claude Massot

biography.bio: Micha Bayard was born on November 20, 1930 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for Les secrets professionnels du Docteur Apfelgluck (1991), La fête des mères (1969) and The Man from Acapulco (1973).
biography.name: Micha Bayard

biography.bio: Jane Beretta is an actress, known for Mademoiselle (1966), Le grand amour (1969) and Mandrin (1947).
biography.name: Jane Beretta

biography.bio: Magali Clément was born on November 27, 1947 in Viroflay, Yvelines, France. She was an actress and director, known for Mr. Klein (1976), Coup de feu (1983) and La cerisaie (1972). She died on November 15, 2008 in Bayeux, Calvados, France.
biography.name: Magali Clément

biography.bio: Emile Coryn is an actor, known for Tant qu'on a la santé (1966), Le grand amour (1969) and Quatre femmes, quatre vies: La maison bleue (1981).
biography.name: Emile Coryn

biography.bio: Sylvie Delalande is an actress, known for Le grand amour (1969).
biography.name: Sylvie Delalande
